publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 52
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa aqyllatadoɣon miźmor David́ǵa. Keĺǵań- d́a Doeg ol edomlu da anlatty Šaulɣa da ajtty anar keĺdi David́ juv́uńa Aḥimeleḫnin. Ńe maḥtanasyn jaman išij byla e baɣatyr ševaɣaty H-nyn har ḱuń.
Qaršavluḥlarny saɣys et́adir tilij üĺuǵuń kibik biĺańǵań qyladyr jaltajlyḥny.
Śuv́d́uj jamanny artyḥ jaḥšydan jalɣanlyḥny artyḥ śoźĺaḿakt́ań rastlyḥny hamḿeš́a.
Śuv́d́uj bar č́ejpalɣan śoźĺarni jaltaj tiĺni.
Daɣy Teńri janč́ar śeni öḿurǵa dejiń synyḥtyryr śeni da sibirir śeni čatyrdan da eksitir śeni tirlik jerd́ań hamḿeš́a.
Da ḱoŕaŕ- ĺar rastlarda qorḥarlar da anyn üśt́uńa ḱuĺarĺar.
Muna ol kiši ki qojmady Teńriǵa kipligiń da išandy ḱopĺuǵuńa ḥoǯalyɣynyn kip- ĺańśa qavšarlyɣy byla.
Da ḿeń jaš zejtun kibik boldum juv́uńd́a Teńriniń išanyrmyn ševaɣaty byla Teńriniń dunjaɣa dejiń.
Š́uḱur et́ar- miń dunjaɣa dejiń ki jarattyj da išanyrmyn šemija ki jaḥšydyr qaršysyna ḥasid́ĺarijnyn. אוֹדְךָ לְעוֹלָם כִי עָשִיתָ וַאֲקַוֶה שִמְךַ כִי טוֹב נֶגֶד חֲסִידֶיךָ ׃
